content: The crate fd-find has seen a lot of random crater test failures. I _suspect_ it is due to directory ordering instability, which I _think_ the crate's tests do not account for. Per https://github.com/sharkdp/fd/issues/919#issuecomment-1003245780 do we know what filesystem is underneath the Docker images?
Just raising this again if anyone knows. If there's a consensus that nobody knows, I'd like to at least put a comment on the fd-find issue.
I believe it's ext4 on all the machines
